ModMetaData.name: ESCP - Ayleid
ModMetaData.author: SirMashedPotato
ModMetaData.description:
Adds in a playable Ayleid race using Humanoid Alien Race Framework. Ayleid are an elven race once thought extinct. Forced to live in the wilds of their old empire, Ayleid have become rather adept at foraging, and are relatively nimble.

-Supports Vanilla Achievements Expanded
-Requires Harmony
-Requires Humanoid Alien Races 2.0
-Based on the 'Elder Scrolls' series by Bethesda Game Studios.
